# transferRepresentation

**Type Property**

A default type that lets the system share your activity.

## Declaration

```swift
static var transferRepresentation: some TransferRepresentation { get }
```

## Discussion

This property contains a default [doc://com.apple.GroupActivities/documentation/GroupActivities/GroupActivityTransferRepresentation] for your activity. The system uses this type to offer your activity via SharePlay.
title: transferRepresentation
